horde2.description: The Magic Shroom increases Flower Dragonets production by 8 per week.

horde2Upgr.description: The Magic Shroom increases Rainbow Dragonets production by 8 per week.

dwellingLvl1.description: Arcane Blossom allows you to recruit Flower Dragonets.

dwellingUpLvl1.description: Upg. Arcane Blossom allows you to recruit Rainbow Dragonets.
